Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the non-disulfide-bridged peptide (NDBP) superfamily. Short antimicrobial peptide (group 4) family.
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.23415044] Virus:Hepatitis C virus (EC50=1.84 μg/ml).Cytotoxic:Huh7.5.1 cells (CC50=79.8 μg/ml)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.23415044] HC50 = 137.9 μg/ml  against human red blood cells.
Sequence Information.Function: Inhibit hepatitis C virus(HCV) infection via inactivating infectious viral particle.  However, it cannot suppress established infection because of the poor cellular uptake and restriction of endosomes.

Literature.Title: Design of histidine-rich peptides with enhanced bioavailability and inhibitory activity against hepatitis C virus.
Literature.Author: Hong W, Zhang R, Di Z, He Y, Zhao Z, Hu J, Wu Y, Li W, Cao Z.
